product_name: Alite Clover Cook Utensil Set - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Clover Cook Utensil Set is a 3-in-1 cooking tool that makes cooking in the outdoors simple and fun! It includes a spoon and spatula that join together to create tongs. Use the big spoon to stir your 5-alarm chili; the spatula is great for flipping golden buttermilk pancakes. Spatula features a serrated edge for cutting through your sunrise omelet or slicing through that morning sausage. But the real magic happens when the spoon and spatula are joined together to form tongs. Reverse and nest the spoon and spatula back together for space savings and ease when you're on the go. Boil-safe and BPA free; safe for use on nonstick cookware. Closeout.
short_description: The Clover Cook Utensil Set is a 3-in-1 cooking tool that makes cooking in the outdoors simple and fun! It includes a spoon and spatula that join together to create tongs.
